about_the_game:
The Fourth Chapter of the visual novel One Day in London.

In the finale of the previous chapter Jeremy found himself in an unenviable situation. He has to save himself, overcome many obstacles... and get his revenge.

Everything - his forces, his determination and his devotion to his friends - will be challenged in the penultimate Chapter of our story. All the decisions that you made in the previous Chapters will influence the outcome of the fight. There is not a lot of time left...

  • 6-14 hours of gameplay
  • New mini-games
  • New characters
  • More maoru
  • And plenty of alternative variants of events!

Attention! The old characters may change beyond recognition.

In the finale of the previous chapter Jeremy found himself in an unenviable situation. He has to save himself, overcome many obstacles... and get his revenge.

Everything - his forces, his determination and his devotion to his friends - will be challenged in the penultimate Chapter of our story. All the decisions that you made in the previous Chapters will influence the outcome of the fight. There is not a lot of time left...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: 2.33 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compliant
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/Win 7/Win 8
  • Processor: 2.33+ Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Better than Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compliant

short_description: The long-awaited Fourth Chapter of the visual novel One Day in London! When the enemy seems to have already won, will Jeremy be able to continue to fight?
